verbs.description: While [ARG0: Trump] [ARGM-TMP: recently] [V: negotiated] [ARG1: the complete denuclearisation of North Korea] [ARG2: with the secretive state ’s Supreme Leader , Kim Jong - un] , pop legend Cher doggedly stuck to her guns .
